title: AidEx
subtitle: Blood Donation & Funding Platform
description: Full-stack web platform connecting blood donors with recipients and enabling secure online funding for life-saving causes. Features role-based access control, real-time blood donor search by location, Stripe payment integration, and comprehensive admin dashboard with analytics.
detailedDescription: AidEx is a comprehensive blood donation and funding platform designed to bridge the gap between blood donors and recipients while enabling secure online funding for medical causes. The platform features a sophisticated search system that allows users to find blood donors by blood group, district, and upazila (sub-district) in Bangladesh. It includes role-based access control with three user types: Donors, Volunteers, and Admins. Donors can create and manage blood donation requests, accept requests from others, and track their donation history. Admins and Volunteers have access to a powerful dashboard with real-time statistics, user management capabilities, and comprehensive analytics including request status tracking, monthly trends, blood group distribution, and user role breakdowns. The platform integrates Stripe Checkout for secure payment processing, allowing users to contribute funds to support the platform's mission. Built with modern web technologies including React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Firebase Authentication, it ensures scalability, security, and an intuitive user experience with smooth animations powered by Framer Motion.
features: Role-based access control system with three user types (Donor, Volunteer, Admin) each having distinct permissions and dashboard views
Advanced blood donor search by blood group, district, and upazila with real-time filtering and location-based matching
Complete blood donation request lifecycle management with status tracking (Pending → In Progress → Done/Canceled)
Comprehensive admin dashboard with real-time statistics, analytics charts, user management, and secure Stripe payment integration
challenges: Implementing secure JWT-based authentication using Firebase Admin SDK on the backend to verify Firebase tokens and protect API routes from unauthorized access
Designing a location-based blood donor search system that integrates with Bangladesh's district and upazila data, requiring efficient filtering and real-time data fetching
Building a complex role-based access control system where each role has different permissions and dashboard views, requiring careful state management and route protection
Integrating Stripe Checkout API with proper session management, payment verification, and preventing duplicate transaction records while handling various payment scenarios
improvements: Implement real-time notifications using WebSockets or Firebase Cloud Messaging to alert donors when new requests match their blood group and location
Add email notification system using SendGrid or Nodemailer to notify users about request updates, successful donations, and payment confirmations
Implement advanced analytics with exportable reports (PDF/CSV) and donor leaderboard with gamification features to encourage more donations
Add mobile app versions for iOS and Android using React Native to increase accessibility and enable push notifications for urgent blood requests

title: WeCare
subtitle: Volunteer Event Management Platform
description: Community-driven platform connecting volunteers with meaningful causes. Features event creation, real-time search & filtering, personal dashboard with event management, and secure Firebase authentication with JWT verification.
detailedDescription: WeCare is a full-stack volunteer event management platform that bridges the gap between organizations and volunteers. Organizations can create, edit, and manage volunteer events while volunteers can discover opportunities through advanced search and filtering, join events, and track their participation. The platform features Firebase authentication with server-side JWT verification using Firebase Admin SDK, MongoDB for data persistence, and a polished UI built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion animations.
features: Create, edit, and delete volunteer events with category selection and date picker
Real-time search and filter by 12 event categories with multiple sort options
Personal dashboard for managing created events and tracking joined volunteer activities
Secure Firebase authentication with server-side JWT verification using Firebase Admin SDK
challenges: Implementing secure server-side JWT verification using Firebase Admin SDK to protect API endpoints and prevent unauthorized access
Building real-time search with regex pattern matching that handles flexible spacing and filters upcoming events by date comparison
Managing event join state across multiple components while preventing duplicate joins through database validation
Creating a dual-role dashboard that seamlessly handles both event creator and volunteer participant workflows
improvements: Add email notifications for event reminders, updates, and cancellations using services like SendGrid or Nodemailer
Implement volunteer hour tracking with certificates and downloadable participation reports for resume building
Add image upload functionality using cloud storage (Cloudinary/AWS S3) instead of URL-based thumbnails
Create event capacity limits with waitlist management and real-time participant count updates

title: Smart Deals
subtitle: Bidding Platform for Smart Shoppers
description: A modern bidding platform where users can list products and receive competitive bids. Features Firebase authentication, real-time bid management, and a stunning neon-glow UI with glassmorphism design.
detailedDescription: Smart Deals is a full-stack bidding platform that enables users to buy and sell products through a competitive bidding system. Sellers can list new or used products with price ranges, while buyers place bids within those ranges. The platform features secure Firebase authentication with JWT token verification, protected routes for authenticated users, and comprehensive product management. Built with React and Node.js, it showcases modern UI/UX with neon aesthetics, smooth Framer Motion animations, and fully responsive layouts across all devices.
features: Competitive bidding system with real-time validation ensuring bids fall within seller-defined price ranges
Secure Firebase authentication with Google Sign-In and backend JWT token verification using Firebase Admin SDK
Complete product management allowing sellers to create, edit, delete listings and mark items as sold
Dual-interface bid tracking where sellers manage incoming bids and buyers monitor their bid history
challenges: Implementing secure JWT token verification on the backend using Firebase Admin SDK to protect all sensitive API endpoints
Building a bidding validation system that ensures bids fall within seller-defined price ranges and prevents invalid submissions
Creating responsive table and card layouts that adapt seamlessly between desktop and mobile views for complex data displays
Managing authentication state across protected routes while maintaining smooth user experience and proper error handling
improvements: Add real-time notifications using WebSockets to alert sellers instantly when new bids are placed on their products
Implement automatic bid expiration system with countdown timers to create urgency and improve engagement
Add image upload functionality with cloud storage integration instead of relying on external URLs
Create an admin dashboard with analytics showing bid trends, popular categories, and platform usage statistics

title: FishMart
subtitle: Full-Featured E-Commerce Platform for Fresh Fish
description: A modern, responsive e-commerce web application for buying fresh fish online in Bangladesh, featuring authentication, shopping cart, real-time search, and comprehensive product management.
detailedDescription: FishMart is a complete e-commerce solution built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS, designed specifically for the fresh fish market in Bangladesh. The platform features cookie-based authentication, localStorage-powered shopping cart, real-time product search with instant results, protected routes with middleware, and a rich product catalog with detailed nutritional information. The application emphasizes clean UI with smooth Framer Motion animations, mobile-first responsive design, and optimal performance. With 24+ fish products including comprehensive details like nutritional facts, cooking tips, and storage instructions, FishMart delivers a seamless shopping experience across all devices.
features: Cookie-based authentication system with protected routes and middleware
Real-time search with instant product filtering and dropdown results
Shopping cart with localStorage persistence, quantity management, and dynamic badge counter
Comprehensive product pages with nutritional info, cooking tips, storage guidelines, and tabbed interface
challenges: Implementing real-time search functionality without performance degradation using React useMemo for efficient filtering
Managing cart state synchronization across multiple browser tabs and components using localStorage events and polling intervals
Creating smooth page transitions and animations while maintaining consistent 60fps performance on low-end mobile devices
Building fully responsive layouts that adapt seamlessly from 320px mobile screens to 2xl+ desktop displays
improvements: Integrate popular Bangladesh payment gateways (bKash, Nagad, Rocket) for secure online transactions
Add comprehensive user profile system with order history, saved addresses, and wishlist functionality
Implement real-time inventory management system with low-stock alerts and automatic notifications
Add location-based delivery zone mapping with dynamic pricing calculator and estimated delivery times
